# 生成闭合路径数据
在Follow Path 模式，需要提供一个路径描点，可以先用svg生成`<path d="">`形式的点集，然后将d的值用下列的方法转换成点数组，直接可以配置到PathPoints里。    
注意：这里的d的值，只能有M和L指令，H和V可以手工转换成L。若有其它指令，需转换成L形式。
```javascript
var v1 = "M107.6921,130.91L106.2782,131.9136L104.4726,134.4252L104.2153,131.7485L102.6723,132.41672L99.4512,132.0826L96.4916,131.2454L94.303,129.74L92.1151,129.0705L91.2153,127.39612L89.6696,126.8942L86.9668,124.5517L84.9055,123.5481L83.7485,124.3841L80.0156,121.875L77.3121,119.6987L76.5396,115.85082L78.4718,116.35131L78.601,114.51051L77.572,112.66972L77.8277,109.8238L74.8666,105.8082L70.4916,104.30161L69.7195,101.62491L67.6597,99.9517L67.2725,98.9469L66.7565,97.10611L66.8857,95.6007L65.2119,94.9312L64.4405,95.2641L63.66806,91.9191L64.4405,91.2483L64.0537,90.4124L66.6284,88.7381L68.5579,88.0698L71.3925,88.40391L72.4215,86.229L75.8975,85.8936L76.798,84.38821L81.0465,82.54741L81.4329,81.7102L81.173,79.7017L83.1044,78.8658L80.6597,72.84031L85.9379,71.3336L87.3525,70.6654L89.2847,64.3057L94.6928,65.47711L96.1094,63.80264L96.2359,60.2875L98.5522,60.1211L100.6136,57.7798L101.6425,57.4444L102.2873,59.7869L104.6044,61.7955L108.4661,62.96681L110.269,65.8112L109.2386,69.9959L110.269,71.50131L113.4859,72.0044L117.0911,72.5048L120.3079,74.6811L121.981,75.1829L123.1399,78.3627L124.8121,80.3712L127.774,80.3712L133.3095,81.20841L136.9146,80.7066L139.6159,81.20841L143.4768,83.3833L146.8255,83.3833L147.9844,84.38821L151.0755,82.54741L155.4505,81.37481L159.5713,81.20841L162.659,79.8694L164.591,78.02861L166.5225,76.8561L166.0065,75.686L165.2325,74.347L166.649,72.17081L168.0655,72.5048L170.8975,73.1757L173.601,71.3336L177.7203,69.9959L179.6524,67.6522L181.5835,66.64841L185.4455,66.1466L187.6341,66.482L187.8925,65.3094L185.4455,62.7991L183.2557,61.7955L181.197,62.96681L178.4958,62.46496L177.0762,62.96681L176.3045,61.46141L178.2367,57.9462L179.5232,55.43594L182.7435,56.60591L186.6044,54.4323L186.6044,52.9256L189.0514,49.2439L190.4653,48.0727L186.6044,46.2319L188.9196,45.3947L191.236,43.5526L194.586,42.88571L198.0614,42.88571L202.1795,43.8893L204.4958,45.2283L206.1696,48.74224L207.2012,50.24766L208.101,52.4237L209.13,55.7701L213.765,56.94261L216.9844,59.4516L218.1425,62.63271L222.1315,62.63271L224.5785,61.2937L228.9535,60.2875L227.5396,63.46986L226.5091,64.80761L225.6094,68.4892L223.8064,72.0044L220.4604,71.3336L218.1425,72.5048L218.913,75.5171L218.5282,79.7017L217.1117,79.8694L217.1117,81.5438L215.437,79.534L214.409,81.5438L210.1604,83.0479L210.548,84.89L208.2294,84.721L206.9428,83.551L205.14,86.06L202.1787,88.0698L199.99,90.2447L196.2584,91.2483L194.1986,92.9227L191.3666,93.92631L192.7832,92.2518L192.2698,90.91551L194.3277,88.5716L192.9097,86.7295L190.596,87.9021L187.5057,90.4124L185.832,92.58731L183.2557,92.755L181.8418,94.4281L183.2557,96.7706L185.4455,97.2738L185.5736,98.9469L187.635,99.9517L190.7226,97.4415L193.1696,98.7792L194.8418,98.9469L195.2302,100.7877L191.4966,101.7912L190.2104,103.63212L187.6357,105.3065L186.2176,107.817063L189.0522,109.65915L190.2104,113.171762L191.755,116.351562L193.6845,119.029562L193.5564,121.706261L191.8815,122.711031L192.5274,124.5517L194.072,125.5566L193.6845,128.399962L193.0423,131.2454L191.4966,131.58105L189.5636,135.26266L187.3758,139.94799L184.933,144.13255L181.1986,147.31236L177.4668,150.32459L174.3765,150.66012L172.7027,152.16434L171.803,151.160882L170.2584,152.833983L166.5248,154.674783L163.6936,155.17658L162.7938,158.85935L161.2466,159.02705L160.6044,156.51649L161.2466,155.17619L157.6425,154.00606L156.3575,154.50915L153.654,153.6704L152.365,152.33296L152.7515,150.32459L150.3072,149.65522L149.0198,148.316222L146.7035,150.157022L144.1284,150.491122L141.9413,150.491122L140.5248,151.32845L139.1094,151.83012L139.495,155.845823L138.077,155.845823L137.8213,155.009922L137.6928,153.50465L135.7614,154.50955L134.6018,154.00645L132.543,152.66745L133.3136,149.65522L131.64,148.98598L130.995,145.80618L128.163,146.30785L128.5495,142.29215L130.995,139.278622L131.1258,136.43435L131.1258,133.75635L129.837,132.91915L128.937,130.910782L127.3925,131.079652L124.5595,130.577983L125.4604,129.07141L124.1745,126.895082L122.2409,128.40035L119.9272,127.56445L116.8354,129.740652L114.3899,132.41735L112.1978,132.75208Z";
function OutPut(x) {
    var rsl = "M" + x.shift().join();
    x.forEach(pp => {
        rsl += "L" + pp.join()
    })
    return rsl + "Z";
}

function ToObj(str) {
    str = str.substr(1, str.length - 2);
    var p1 = str.split("L");
    var pp = [];
    p1.forEach(s => {
        var p2 = s.split(",");
        p2[0] *= 1;
        p2[1] *= 1;
        pp.push(p2);
    })
    return pp;
}

r=ToObj(v1)

//可以进行一些平移及放大拉伸等操作
r.forEach(x => {
    x[0] -= 50
    x[1] -= 30
    x[0] *= 5
    x[1] *= 5

    x[0] = x[0].toFixed(1)
    x[1] = x[1].toFixed(1)
});
//OutPut(r)     //可以放到svg里预览
console.log(JSON.stringify(r).replace(/"/g,""))
```
